relation: Por el amor de una mujer
TableContextTimeStampBeforeTable: {66704=Host Linda Olson-Osterlund speaks with Edith Mirante founder of Project Maje about the transition to democracy in Burma and the struggle of minorities there. Mirante traveled to areas of conflict in Burma in November and will talk about the recent democratic reforms., 23079=Solitary Confinement and the A3; Interview; psycgologist Terry Kupers; http://kboo.fm/node/22161, 24163=Tuesday May 29th, Albert Woodfox of the Angola 3 begins a three day hearing to overturn his conviction for murder of a prison guard in 1972. This conviction has been overturned twice before. The hearing before the US District Court in Baton Rouge, Louisiana will hear arguments regarding discrimination in the selection of the grand jury foreman in Albert Woodfoxe's 1998 retrial. Join host, Linda Olson-Osterlund for this hour long special edition of A Deeper Look. , 54069=If the audio on this page is not working for you, check out http://kboo.fm/node/52133, 23248=More: Feb. 2010 Interview with Robert King Wilkerson; http://kboo.fm/node/16369, 23429=Take Action Now! Call Gov. Jindal toll free 866-366-1121. Tell Him, Free The Angola 3! Release Albert Woodfox & Herman Wallace!}
